text: Just came across this great tweet thread on content/SEO for SaaS. If I had to condense my philosophy to a single tweet, I couldn‚Äôt do any better than this! <https://twitter.com/chimammeje/status/1479455843351420932>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/chimammeje|@chimammeje>: - Build a cluster with ten keywords (focus on middle and bottom of the funnel keywords with higher intent)
- implement the cluster with long-form content
- drive a ton of backlinks to the cluster
- interlink between the cluster and existing pieces on the site
- Rinse and repeat
